    1.0
    Author:
    Yoan Ballesteros, Antoine Sirven

    • Constructor Detail

      • Aquarium

        public Aquarium(java.lang.String name,
                int surface,
                int maxAnimals,
                int depth,
                int salinity,
                int waterLevel)
        Constructor for the aquarium
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the aquarium
        surface - The surface of the aquarium, in meters
        maxAnimals - The maximum number of models.animals that the aquarium can contain
        depth - The depth of the aquarium, in meters
        salinity - The percentage of salinity of the aquarium
        waterLevel - The water level of the aquarium, in meters

        public void cleanEnclosure()
